transArray.content: The breakfast is very rich, with many varieties, and the breakfast time is from 7 to 11 o'clock. The room facilities are complete, the hotel parking is free, and there are oranges available all day long, which is very good. The front desk service is also very friendly. It is very good. I will stay again next time. Choose this one!

Dear guests, hello! Thank you very much for your trust in our hotel and your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. We believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel. Thank you for your recognition of the room attendants and room hygiene. We are very happy to bring you a good stay experience. The hotel strictly abides by the Huazhu Group's guest room policies. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay environment by cleaning the linens and disinfecting them after each guest. All the staff look forward to your next visit and wish you a happy life. General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
